Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I would like to place a request.

Take the black radiators from Interstellar (the ones that Pivot) :


And replace their texture by the OLD interstellar texture (black/dark red)...
At the moment, it just does NOT pivot, also the extend/retract panel breaks down after just one time. I can't fix that on my own and would really appreciate it being fixed :

Thank you for your time should you decide to do a quick fix-it-up for me.

(PS: no need for making it glow or anything, just the Model+Pivot would be fine as I can edit .cfg for the rest and don't care much for glowing)

Edited March 8, 2016 by Francois424

@Francois424

That dark red you're referring to is a "glow". It's just a different texture map for the emissive than what I gave you the first time. The only difference is that it used to be purely cosmetic but now is tied to the actual temperature of the object.

Here's the original thread:

And here's a new link to the original files: https://www.dropbox.com/s/45bodjps003ve9l/heat.7z?dl=0

And and here's another version of the model you can try. No emissive animation, actually uses the textures directly out of the above 7zip: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xnra4f3qbve2fvn/zzzRadiator.zip?dl=0
